articles.description: The Xbox Series X|S continues to be extremely hard to find in 2021, but we're tracking restocks in real-time here.
articles.content: It has been more than two months since the Xbox Series X|S launched, and consoles are still extremely difficult to find. We recently saw a substantial restock--the biggest since Black Friday--from se… [+5742 chars]
